title: Did a Fox 2 Detroit Report Expose Voter Fraud in the 2020 Election?
subtitle: An image graphic detailing an assortment of potential election crimes was shared on social media the day after the 2020 presidential election.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A graphic from a Fox 2 Detroit news report listed serious voter registration issues pertaining to the 2020 U.S. general election.
